text: Pieter ter Veer (22 December 1944 â€“ 11 December 2022) was a Dutch politician and dairy farmer from Zuidhorn. As a politician he he served for Democrats 66 as a member of the House of Representatives from 1981 to 1982 and also from 1989 to 2002. In 2009 Ter Veer married Louise Groenman. He died from an illness in Heemstede on 11 December 2022, at the age of 77. The day after his death, the House of Representatives paid tribute to his death. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Democrats 66 politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Groningen (province)
title: Pieter ter Veer
